dict.string: We are pleased to welcome you!

Our charming bungalow is a ground floor apartment with direct access to the parking and swimming pools. It's located near pine forest and less than 2 km to the central beach. Small private community, 2 pools, Parking, A/C, Heating, BBQ, WiFi.

If our previous guests leave the apartment on the same day, it may take some time to prepare the apartment for your arrival. In this case your check-in time can be only after 14:00. Anyway please call for 20-30 minutes before your arrival to Calpe (+34 693 777 099). It's will be useful if you tell us the approximate time of your arrival.
To get the keys, please call Elena for 20-30 minutes before arrival

We are 60 minutes from Alicante International Airport and 80 minutes from Valencia Airport. Please note that you'll need a car to get around comfortably. GPS Navigators often indicate a wrong location of the apartment, so we recommend use provided routing instructions or set raw coordinates with your GPS Navigator.
Use this coordinates with your GPS Navigator: 38.657705, 0.047746
